QuestData.Title: Meet with Evelyn Thorn
QuestData.Description: I just received a scroll from Evelyn Thorn in Stormwind. She wants you to pay a visit to the Training Hall in Stormwind. She doesn't mention specifics, but I got the impression that it was a matter of some importance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Evelyn Thorn at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Evelyn Thorn at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
